geometry.planar

Class FloatPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.FloatPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FloatPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements a point in the plane as a touple of double's. Because arithmetic calculations with double's are in general not exact, FloatPoint is not derived from the abstract class Point.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatPoint add(FloatPoint p_other)
      Adds the coordinates of this FloatPoint and p_other.
      IntBox bounding_box()
      Creates the smallest IntBox containing this point.
      static IntOctagon bounding_octagon(FloatPoint[] p_point_arr)
      Calculates the smallest IntOctagon containing all the input points
      FloatPoint change_length(FloatPoint p_to_point, double p_new_length)
      Approximates a FloatPoint on the line from this point to p_to_point with distance p_new_length from this point.
      FloatPoint change_size(double p_new_size)
      Approximates a FloatPoint on the line from zero to this point with distance p_new_length from zero.
      FloatPoint circle_center(FloatPoint p_1, FloatPoint p_2)
      Calculates the center of the circle through this point, p_1 and p_2 by calculating the intersection of the two lines perpendicular to and passing through the midpoints of the lines (this, p_1) and (p_1, p_2).
      double distance_square(FloatPoint p_other)
      returns the square of the distance from this Point to the Point p_other
      double distance(FloatPoint p_other)
      returns the distance from this point to the point p_other
      boolean inside_circle(FloatPoint p_1, FloatPoint p_2, FloatPoint p_3)
      Returns true, if this point is contained in the circle through p_1, p_2 and p_3.
      boolean is_contained_in_box(FloatPoint p_1, FloatPoint p_2, double p_tolerance)
      Checks, if this point is contained in the box spanned by p_1 and p_2 with the input tolerance.
      FloatPoint left_tangential_point(FloatPoint p_to_point, double p_distance)
      Calculates the left tangential point of the line from this point to a circle around p_to_point with radius p_distance.
      FloatPoint middle_point(FloatPoint p_to_point)
      Returns the middle point between this point and p_to_point.
      FloatPoint projection_approx(Line p_line)
      Returns an approximation of the perpendicular projection of this point onto p_line
      FloatPoint right_tangential_point(FloatPoint p_to_point, double p_distance)
      Calculates the right tangential point of the line from this point to a circle around p_to_point with radius p_distance.
      FloatPoint rotate(double p_angle, FloatPoint p_pole)
      Rotates this FloatPoints by p_angle ( in radian ) around the p_pole.
      IntPoint round_to_grid(int p_horizontal_grid, int p_vertical_grid)
      Round this Point so the x coordinate of the result will be a multiple of p_horizontal_grid and the y coordinate a multiple of p_vertical_grid.
      IntPoint round_to_the_left(Direction p_dir)
      Rounds this point, so that if this point is on the left side of any directed line with direction p_dir, the result point will also be on the left side.
      IntPoint round_to_the_right(Direction p_dir)
      Rounds this point, so that if this point is on the right side of any directed line with direction p_dir, the result point will also be on the right side.
      IntPoint round()
      rounds the coordinates from an object of class Point_double to an object of class IntPoint
      double scalar_product(FloatPoint p_1, FloatPoint p_2)
      Calculates the scalar prodct of (p_1 - this). with (p_2 - this).
      Side side_of(FloatPoint p_1, FloatPoint p_2)
      The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2.

      returns the square of the distance from this point to the zero point

      • side_of

        public Side side_of(FloatPoint p_1,
                    FloatPoint p_2)
        The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2. Collinearity is not defined, becouse numerical calculations ar not exact for FloatPoints.
        Parameters:
        p_1 - a FloatPoint object.
        p_2 - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a Side object.

      • tangential_points

        public FloatPoint[] tangential_points(FloatPoint p_to_point,
                                      double p_distance)
        Calculates the touching points of the tangents from this point to a circle around p_to_point with radius p_distance. Solves the quadratic equation, which results by substituting x by the term in y from the equation of the polar line of a circle with center p_to_point and radius p_distance and putting it into the circle equation. The polar line is the line through the 2 tangential points of the circle looked at from from this point and has the equation (this.x - p_to_point.x) * (x - p_to_point.x) + (this.y - p_to_point.y) * (y - p_to_point.y) = p_distance **2
        Parameters:
        p_to_point - a FloatPoint object.
        p_distance - a double.
        Returns:
        an array of FloatPoint objects.

      • left_tangential_point

        public FloatPoint left_tangential_point(FloatPoint p_to_point,
                                        double p_distance)
        Calculates the left tangential point of the line from this point to a circle around p_to_point with radius p_distance. Returns null, if this point is inside this circle.
        Parameters:
        p_to_point - a FloatPoint object.
        p_distance - a double.
        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.

      • right_tangential_point

        public FloatPoint right_tangential_point(FloatPoint p_to_point,
                                         double p_distance)
        Calculates the right tangential point of the line from this point to a circle around p_to_point with radius p_distance. Returns null, if this point is inside this circle.
        Parameters:
        p_to_point - a FloatPoint object.
        p_distance - a double.
        Returns:
        a FloatPoint object.
